question.text:
Match the hominids with their correct brain size:
  Column – I   Column – II
a  Homo habilis i  900 cc
b  Homo neanderthalensis ii 1350 cc
c  Homo erectus iii 650-800 cc
d  Homo sapiens iv 1400 cc

Select the correct option.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text:
Species Cranial capacity
Homo habilis 650-800 cc
Homo neanderthalensis 1400 cc
Homo erectus 900 cc
Homo sapiens 1350 cc
